title: Comfortview Women's Wide Width The Ellington Wide Calf Boot
features: A classic pair of wide-calf boots is crafted in sleek leather-like upper and featuring an expandable shaft with a chic snap closure.

ABOUT THE BRAND: Shoes designed to be the best-fitting, best-feeling, best-looking footwear for every moment of your life. Our shoes feature flexible and skid resistant soles, stable heels and padded insoles. From casual shoes, to boots, to dress shoes we provide comfort and style every step of the day. Available in 30 sizes and widths.
description: A classic pair of wide-calf boots is crafted in sleek leather-like upper and featuring an expandable shaft with a chic snap closure.  Leather-like upper                   Full inside zipper                              Expandable calf through snap closure                                    5 1/2" shaft height                      1 3/4" heelPadded insole                                Flexible, skid-resistant outsole Boots in Full and half sizes 7-11, 12
